item.title: cassi.ch - Project
item.description: Website: cassi.ch Project type: Website with CMS. Project tecnologies: Frontend framework - Angular Handless CMS - Strapi CMS Containers - Docker Project description: Integrate new CMS and front-end implementation using the design of cloak association.

item.title: domenicoshadlou.ch - Project
item.description: Website: domenicoshadlou.ch Project type: Basic Portfolio Webiste. Project tecnologies: HTML5, CSS3, JS Bootstrap jQuery jQuery scrollify NGINX Web Server Project description: Implement the design of Domenico Shadlou and the animations. Implementation of the website with multi-language support.

item.title: freqline - Project
item.description: Project type: School project. Project tecnologies: Database - MariaDB Backend - Java Frontend - AngularJS Mobile APP - React Native & Expo Controller - Arduino Project description: Build a stand-alone remote controlled waves generator (ultrasonic waves). 1° semester: Design and build the system, with Ethernet communication between Arduino and the Java Backend. 2° semester: Re-design and re-build the communication between Adrduino and the Java backend via Serial Communication.

item.title: lvart.org - Project
item.description: Website: Under Construction Project type: Photography Portfolio Webiste. Project tecnologies: Frontend framework - Angular Handless CMS - Strapi CMS Containers - Docker Project description: Discuss with the client the requirements, then design and develop the website.

item.title: romanmarbles.com - Project
item.description: Website: romanmarbles.com Project type: Knowledge Website. Project tecnologies: HTML5, CSS3, JS Frontend framework - AngularJS Handless CMS - Strapi CMS Containers - Docker Project description: Discuss with the client the requirements, collaborate with Domenico Shadlou for UI/UX and then implement the code. Implementation of the website with multi-language support.

item.title: Tecnical High School
item.description: 2016 - 2020 The School of Arts and Jobs Trevano (Scuola Arti e Mestieri di Trevano - SAMT) is the Tecnical High School in Information Technology with general course of studies. Degree: Federal Certificate of Capability (Attestato Federale di capacità - AFC) Professional Maturity Certificate (Maturità Professionale - MP) School subjects: Coding Networking Server Management Project Management Final project: In this kind of school the final technical exam is a project.
